title: Data is corrupt. I need help guys
body:
When I click on a League of legends icon the window pop-up saying...
"Data is corrupt. Your League of Legends files are corrupt. A repair will be started to address the issue. If you continue the experience this issue, please contact Player Support."

I think i may deleted something that i shouldnt and now i dont know what to do....

Any help? please...{{item:3073}}

replies.body: hextech repair doesnt work for me. Any help pls.  I must reinstall game every day bcs of this. :(

It's not a huge deal! Would suggest in the future not messing with any of the files, but it's not something that can't be undone. If you dowload our [Hextech Repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) tool it won't just come in handy now, but the future as well. It would fix and repair any missing/corrupted files you may have!
Have you tried doing the repair lol?
